questions.question: ………………… teacher needs patience.
questions.description: We can use a/an to talk about any member of a class.

questions.question: I lost ……………………. book which I borrowed from you.
questions.description: We are talking about a particular book here hence we use the.

questions.question: ……………………. Nile is the longest river in the world.
questions.description: Articles are used with the names of rivers.

questions.question: There is ………………….. library in the town.
questions.description: A can be used in the numerical sense of one.

questions.question: It was ……………………… finest day of my life.
questions.description: The article the is used before superlatives.

questions.question: She can play …………………… piano.
questions.description: The article the is used with the names of musical instruments.

questions.question: Should ……………………. police carry guns?
questions.description: The article the is often used to refer to certain well-known groups of people.

questions.question: …………………… baby cow can stand as soon as it is born.
questions.description: A singular countable noun requires an article or another determiner with it.

questions.question: I prefer ……………………. country to ……………………. town.
questions.description: We use the with expressions referring to the physical environment.

questions.question: English people always talk about ………………….. weather.
I watched ……………………. movie yesterday.
questions.description: We do not say which movie it was. Hence we use the indefinite article a here.
